Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Authorizes the town of Patterson to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Authorizes the town of Patterson, in the county of Putnam, to impose a hotel and motel tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Patterson to impose a hotel and motel tax; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
